entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Simplifier.ReduceAsync doesn't consider is-not-pattern binding correctly #69426
  • Cannot Get Test Project to Load Changes in a SG-Based Project #69423
  • Hierarchical .editorconfig files not properly supported by Visual Studio editor #69420
  • Location.GetMappedLineSpan returns file path with forward slash as directory separator #69418
  • SourceGenerators: No file emit despite `EmitCompilerGeneratedFiles` & `CompilerGeneratedFilesOutputPath` #69417

Closed

  • Comments should be aligned with the text below, not above. #65608
    18.0
  • Inline hints errors when cut/paste .cs file #69344
    August
  • Inline hints errors when cut/paste .cs file #69345
    August
  • `IAsyncOperation` and unused usings #69218
  • Improve handling of CS8974 #69286
  • Inconsistent back compatibility behavior with unsafe types #69422
    Backlog
  • Whitespaces in format specifiers of raw strings are not trimmed #69333
  • Cannot paste tabs into editor anymore #69124
    17.8 P4
  • Spurious CS8769 on String Property Setter of Interface Implementation #69337
  • IDE0083 shouldn't be issued in expression trees #68784
    17.8 P4

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix CodeStylePage EditorConfigOptionsGenerator service #69425
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not use cached CompilationWithAnalyzers which don't contain all an… #69419
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

Merged

  • Object Favorites: Avoid name collisions on hidden properties #69349
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify .Kind() checks in the IDE layers. #69409
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use SyntaxFactory.IdentifierName to create an instance of SyntaxNode instead of SyntaxToken (#38311) #69318
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Do not offer 'use pattern matching' inside an expression tree #69362
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Extract collection-expression creation code into its own helper type. #69407
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add an LSP notification for loading projects #69427
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implementation for Regex QuickInfo Provider and it includes documentation for Regular Expressions. #69405
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add LanguageVersion for C# 12 #69383
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Add LSP Simplify Method for Razor #69323
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix analyzer conflicts on Linux #69406
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • A better descriptor Id for an F# analyzer #69313
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Add LanguageName to telemetry information passed in for CodeRefactoring_Delay and CodeFix_Delay telemetry calls #69350
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add analyzer/fixer to recommend updating stackalloc expressions to use collection expressions. #69414
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix constraint cycle through nested type of base type #69242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for assembly/module-level `[Experimental]` and contextual suppression #69316
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Enable tests for #68731 #69193
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: use inline arrays for collection expressions with span target types #69412
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Use argument validation consistently in all SourceText implementations #69391
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Use CultureInfo.InvariantCulture when creating a StringWriter #69388
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Use PooledStringBuilder in StringTextWriter #69386
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Source text writer encoding #69373
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Add assertions for length to StringTextWriter & LargeTextWriter #69369
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Fix issues where internal pattern matching state was being copied #69336
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Clean up test partition warnings #66986
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve EOL consistency for Add Using #69309
    Area-IDE, untriaged
